content.rendered:
Directed by Gautham Vasudev Menon.

Written by Kona Venkat.

Cast Naga Chaitanya Akkineni(Rajinikanth Muralidhar). Manjima Mohan(Leela Satyamurthy).Baba Sehgal. Rakendu Mouli(Mahesh) .Daniel Balaji.Sathish Krishnan. Gautham Vasudev Menon(Police Officer (as Gautham Menon)). Krrish Menon(Atul).Nagineedu. Samragni Rajan(Younger Anamika). Priyadarshini Rajkumar(Anamika (as Priyaa Rajkumar))

Language Telugu.

Producers Vijay Shankar Donkada. Reshma Ghatala. Gautham Vasudev Menon. Miryala Ravinder Reddy. Venkat Somasundaram. Sunitha Tati.

Production Dwaraka Creations. Ondraga Entertainment.
